## How to test

1. Ensure code:
   1. builds
   2. Passes unit tests
   3. Passes linter
2. Does the code meet the completion criteria for the original issue?
   - If not, explain why the code is different

## Checklist

I agree that:
[ ] I tested my changes locally  
[ ] My code follows project conventions  
[ ] I updated docs if needed  
[ ] I have added either Brett or Cameron to review the PR
[ ] This PR is ready for review
